meanings.sent1: The accumulated toys in the corner made the room look messy.
meanings.sent2: The accumulated leaves in the yard needed to be raked.
meanings.sent3: The accumulated laundry seemed to have a party of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her accumulated knowledge on the subject impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The accumulated dust on the shelves was thick and grey.

meanings.sent1: The accumulated snow on the mountain made it a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent2: The accumulated bills on the table needed to be paid.
meanings.sent3: The accumulated snacks in his backpack made it heavy to carry.
meanings.sent4: Her accumulated happiness shone through her smile.
meanings.sent5: The accumulated books on the shelf reached the ceiling.

meanings.sent1: The accumulated dishes in the sink needed to be washed.
meanings.sent2: The accumulated garbage in the bin started to smell.
meanings.sent3: The accumulated shoes by the door made it hard to walk in.
meanings.sent4: Her accumulated belongings filled the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The accumulated leaves in the garden created a colorful mound.
